"use strict";(()=>{gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger,Observer);var y=new Lenis;y.on("scroll",ScrollTrigger.update);gsap.ticker.add(r=>{y.raf(r*1e3)});gsap.ticker.lagSmoothing(0);var _=r=>{let e=r.innerHTML;r.style.overflow="hidden";let i=e.split(/(<br>)/).map(o=>o==="<br>"?null:`<span style="display: inline-block;">${o}</span>`).join(" ");r.innerHTML=i},T=r=>{if(!r)return;r.style.overflow="hidden";let e=r.innerText.split(" ");return r.innerHTML="",e.forEach(t=>{let i=document.createElement("span");i.innerText=t,i.style.display="inline-block",r.appendChild(i),r.innerHTML+=" "}),r},A=r=>{if(!r)return;r.style.whiteSpace="pre-wrap",r.style.overflow="hidden";let e=r.innerText.split("");return r.innerHTML="",e.forEach(t=>{let i=document.createElement("span");i.innerText=t,r.appendChild(i)}),r},S=class{constructor(){this.resize()}navHover(){this.navLinks&&this.navLinks.forEach(e=>{let{image:t}=e.dataset;if(t){let i;e.addEventListener("mouseover",()=>{clearTimeout(i),this.navImage.src=t,gsap.to([this.navImage,this.navOverlay],{opacity:1,duration:.4})}),e.addEventListener("mouseout",()=>{this.imageState||gsap.to([this.navImage,this.navOverlay],{opacity:0,duration:.4})})}})}hideMenuAnimation(e){return new Promise(t=>{let i=gsap.timeline({defaults:{ease:"power2.inOut",duration:.6},onComplete:()=>{t()}});this.imageState=!0,this.navImage.src=e.dataset.image,this.navImage.style.opacity=1,this.navOverlay.style.opacity=1,i.to(this.separators,{width:"0%"}).to(this.navLinks,{y:100},"-=0.5").to([this.navRightMenu.navFooterLinks,this.navRightMenu.copyLeft,this.navRightMenu.copyRight],{y:200,duration:1.5},"-=0.5").to(this.navRightMenu.separator,{width:0,duration:.7},"-=1.5").to([this.navRightMenu.paragraph.querySelectorAll("span span"),this.navRightMenu.copyRight.querySelectorAll("span span")],{y:300,duration:1.5,stagger:.05},"-=1.5").to([this.navImageWrap,this.navHeader],{width:"100vw",ease:"power4.out",duration:1.2},"-=.65")})}setup(){this.imageState=!1,this.navImage=document.querySelector("#nav-image"),this.menuButton=document.querySelector(".nav_buttons .nav_btn"),this.navOverlay=document.querySelector(".nav_grid .nav_image-overlay"),this.navLinks=document.querySelectorAll(".nav_link"),this.separators=document.querySelectorAll(".horizontal-separator"),this.header=document.querySelector(".header"),this.navHeader=document.querySelector(".nav_header"),this.navRightMenu={paragraph:document.querySelector(".nav_footer-list a",{y:0,stagger:.05,ease:"power2.out"},"-=0.7")}desktopMenuTL(){gsap.timeline({defaults:{ease:"power2.inOut",duration:.6}}).addLabel("start",.25).fromTo(this.navLinks,{y:-100,opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1,stagger:.05,ease:"power2.out"},"start").fromTo(this.separators,{width:0,opacity:0},{opacity:1,width:"100%"},"start+=0.2").fromTo([this.navRightMenu.navFooterLinks,this.navRightMenu.copyLeft,this.navRightMenu.copyRight],{y:-200,opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1},"start").fromTo(this.navRightMenu.separator,{width:0,opacity:0},{width:"100%",opacity:1},"start").fromTo([this.navRightMenu.paragraph.querySelectorAll("span span"),this.navRightMenu.copyRight.querySelectorAll("span span")],{y:-300,opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1,stagger:.05,duration:.75},"start")}openMenuAnimation(){this.device==="desktop"?this.desktopMenuTL():this.device==="mobile"&&this.mobileMenuTL()}resize(){window.addEventListener("resize",()=>{window.innerWidth>767&&this.device==="mobile"?(this.device="desktop",this.init()):window.innerWidth<=767&&this.device==="desktop"&&(this.device="mobile",this.init())})}init(){this.setup();let e=(t,i)=>{t.preventDefault(),this.device==="desktop"?this.hideMenuAnimation(i).then(()=>{barba.go(i.dataset.href,{trigger:"nav-animation"})}):barba.go(i.dataset.href,{trigger:"nav-animation"})};this.navLinks.forEach(t=>{t.addEventListener("click",i=>e(i,t)),t.addEventListener("keypress",i=>{(i.key==="Enter"||i.keyCode===13)&&(console.log("enter"),e(i,t))})}),this.device==="desktop"&&this.navHover(),this.menuButton.addEventListener("click",()=>this.openMenuAnimation())}},b=class{constructor(){this.footer=document.querySelector(".section_sticky-footer"),this.ScrollTrigger=ScrollTrigger}footerAnimation(){let p"),{clearProps:"all"})}),this.DOM.slidesInner.forEach(e=>{gsap.set(e,{clearProps:"all"})}))}enableSlider(){this.obs.isEnabled||this.obs.enable(),this.DOM.wrapper.classList.add("js_slider")}next(){this.navigate(this.NEXT)}prev(){this.navigate(this.PREV)}navigateTo(e){if(this.isAnimating||e===this.current)return!1;if(this.isAnimating=!0,e<0||e>=this.slidesTotal)return;let t=e>this.current?1:-1,i=this.DOM.slides[this.current].querySelectorAll(".slider_text-fade"),o=this.current;this.current=e;let n=this.DOM.slides[o],l=this.DOM.slidesInner[o],c=this.DOM.slides[this.current],h=this.DOM.slidesInner[this.current],d=0,u=this.DOM.slides[this.current].querySelectorAll(".slider_text-fade");i.length>0?d=.8:d=0,this.updateActiveDot(),gsap.timeline({defaults:{duration:1.6,ease:"power3.inOut"},onStart:()=>{this.DOM.slides[this.current].classList.add("js_slider_slide--current")},onComplete:()=>{this.DOM.slides[o].classList.remove("js_slider_slide--current"),this.isAnimating=!1}}).addLabel("text-fade",0).addLabel("start",d).set(u,{opacity:0}).to(i,{opacity:0,duration:1},"text-fade").to(n,{xPercent:-t*100},"start").to(l,{startAt:{transformOrigin:t===this.NEXT?"100% t=this.DOM.slides[this.current].querySelectorAll(".slider_text-fade"),i=this.current;this.current=e===1?this.current<this.slidesTotal-1?++this.current:0:this.current>0?--this.current:this.slidesTotal-1,this.updateActiveDot();let 50%",xPercent:-e*100,scaleX:4},{xPercent:0,scaleX:1},"start").to(d,{opacity:1,duration:1})}afterResize(){this.device==="desktop"?this.DOM.wrapper.classList.contains("js_mobile_slider")?this.disableSlider():this.enableSlider():this.device==="mobile"&&(this.DOM.wrapper.classList.contains("no-slider-mobile")?this.disableSlider():(this.enableSlider(),this.DOM.slides[this.current].classList.remove("js_slider_slide--current"),this.current=this.DOM.slides.findIndex(e=>e.dataset.slider)!==-1?this.DOM.slides.findIndex(e=>e.dataset.slider):0,this.DOM.slides[this.current].classList.add("js_slider_slide--current")))}resize(){window.addEventListener("resize",()=>{window.innerWidth>767&&this.device==="mobile"?(this.device="desktop",this.afterResize()):window.innerWidth<=767&&this.device==="desktop"&&(this.device="mobile",this.afterResize())}),this.afterResize()}},w=class{constructor(){this.navAnimation=new L(s,a){a=!a,s.setAttribute("aria-expanded",a),s.classList.toggle("is-active"),s.nextElementSibling.classList.toggle("is-active")}this.mobileSliderAnimations(),this.desktopSliderAnimations()}sectionCutIn(){let e=document.querySelector(".cut-in-section");if(!e)return;let t=gsap.matchMedia(),i=gsap.timeline();t.add("(min-width: 1200px)",()=>{i.to(e,{clipPath:"polygon(10% 10%, 90% 10%, 90% 90%, 10% 90%)"})}).add("(max-width: 1199px)",()=>{i.to(e,{clipPath:"polygon(5% 10%, 95% 10%, 95% 90%, 5% 90%)"})}),ScrollTrigger.create({trigger:e,scrub:!0,markers:!1,pin:!0,animation:i})}scaleIn(){let i=gsap.timeline(),o=e.querySelector(".scale-grid_item").clientWidth,n;n=window.innerWidth/o,i.add("start").to(e,{scale:n},"start").to(".scale-grid_item img",{scale:1,yPercent:"50"},"start").to(".scale-grid_item:not(.scale-grid_item-middle)",{opacity:.3},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._1",{x:-50},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._3",{x:50},"start").to(".scale-grid_item._4",{y:50},"start"),ScrollTrigger.create({trigger:t,markers:!1,pin:!0,end:"+=1000",scrub:!0,animation:i})}parallaxImages(){if(!document.querySelector(".three-col_component"))return;gsap.matchMedia().add({isMobile:"screen and (max-width: 767px)",isDesktop:"screen and (min-width: 768px)"},t=>{let{isMobile:i,isDesktop:o}=t.conditions;if(o){let n=gsap.timeline({scrollTrigger:{start:"center center",end:"bottom center",trigger:".three-col_image-wrap.second",scrub:1.5,invalidateOnRefresh:!0,pin:".three-col_component"}});n.to(".three-col_image-wrap.first",{translateY:0,duration:1}),n.to(".three-col_image-wrap.third",{translateY:0,duration:1},"<")}if(i){let n=gsap.timeline({paused:!0});n&&n.to(".three-col_image-wrap.first",{translateY:0,duration:1});let l=gsap.timeline({paused:!0});l&&l.to(".three-col_image-wrap.third",{translateY:0,duration:1})}})}amenitiesAnimation(){this.sectionCutIn(),this.scaleIn(),this.parallaxImages()}init(){this.stephenCustomCode(),this.navAnimation.init(),this.sliders(),this.amenitiesAnimation(),this.footerPageTransition()}};window.Webflow||(window.Webflow=[]);window.Webflow.push(()=>{let r=new w;r.init(),r.barbaInit()});})();
